description: He was fined and disqualified from driving for 18 months for driving into the legs of a race steward.
title: Jersey Constable Christopher Taylor found guilty of dangerous driving
title_page: Jersey Constable Christopher Taylor found guilty of dangerous driving - BBC News
maintext: The victim said he was pushed backwards by the impact and slammed his hands on the bonnet, after which Mr Taylor continued to "nudge" him further backwards with his car.
